      • matching

        public int matching(int variable,
                    int label,
                    int value)

        It checks if the value of a specific label in a specific attribute matchs with a given value

        Parameters:
        variable - int Attribute which we are going to check
        label - int Attribute's label we are going to check
        value - int Value to be compared
        Returns:
        int 1 = they match, 0 = they don't.
